channel.title: CVE Feed for WPBrigade -- LoginPress | Custom Login Page Customizer (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-41839|2024-09-17T04:09:10.113Z -- wpbrigade -- loginpress%20%7C%20custom%20login%20page%20customizer%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Broken Access Control vulnerability in WordPress LoginPress plugin <= 1.6.2 on WordPress leading to unauth. changing of Opt-In or Opt-Out tracking settings.
